title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
description: The swashbuckling archaeologist returns in one of his most challenging adventures yet! A novelization of the major motion pictureThe time is 1935. Through a series of misadventures in Shanghai—and a narrow escape from death—Indiana Jones finds himself in a remote village in India. A mysterious old shaman tells him that his arrival has been foreseen—and that he and his companions are destined to save the villagers.So begins the most daring, dark, and dangerous quest of Indiana Jones’s career.
author: James Kahn
